column1: '''Bellomarius''' was the greatest dragon-slayer that the realm of the [[Middle Kingdom]] had ever known.  He was said to be the maternal great-great-grandfather of [[Augustus Bonifacius]]
column2: who was the king of the [[Middle Kingdom]] when [[Farmer Giles]] lived in the realm.  He had also owned a famous sword called [[Caudimordax]] which had languished in the king's armoury.  When Farmer Giles chased off a [[The Giant|giant]] that had come to the village of [[Ham]]
column3: the king made a present of the sword to the rustic.  Thus
column5: Giles was the heir of Bellomarius.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
